subdisciplines.name: Formal epistemology
subdisciplines.description: The study of mathematical or logical models for knowledge and belief, including Bayesianism, decision theory, and game theory.

subdisciplines.name: Sociology of knowledge
subdisciplines.description: The study of the social construction of knowledge and how it shapes society.

subdisciplines.name: Feminist epistemology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how gender affects knowledge and beliefs, and how to address gender biases in epistemology.
